audioText: J'adore mes vacances d'été à la plage.
question: J'adore mes vacances d'été à la plage.
options: I love my summer vacation at the beach
I hate my winter vacation in the mountains
I enjoy my spring break in the city
I prefer my autumn trips to the countryside
explanation: The text states 'J'adore mes vacances d'été à la plage' - I love my summer vacation at the beach. 'Adore' means love/adore, 'vacances' means vacation, and 'plage' means beach.
